actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-975.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 339 - 74 (Record Vote No: 441).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 2005) to amend title II of the Social Security Act and related provisions of law to make minor improvements and necessary technical changes, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 2005 (hazardous substance Superfund) and against its consideration.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 2005) to amend title II of the Social Security Act and related provisions of law to make minor improvements and necessary technical changes, and against the consideration of such conference report.
